colorFormatHex.message: HEX: Hexadecimal color value, commonly used in web development

colorFormatRgb.message: RGB: Red, Green, Blue values, range 0-255

colorFormatHsl.message: HSL: Hue, Saturation, Lightness - more intuitive color representation

clickAnywhere.message: Click anywhere on the screen to pick a color

eyedropperNotSupported.message: EyeDropper API is not supported in this browser. Please use Chrome 95+ or Edge 95+.
